title: Volume & Capacity Conversions (L, m³, gal, cups, fl oz)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Liters = value × factorToLiter[unit] Target value = liters ÷ factorToLiter[targetUnit] Example: 3 US gallons → L → UK pints 3 × 3.785411784 = 11.356235352 L UK pint factor = 0.56826125 L → 11.356235352 ÷ 0.56826125 ≈ 19.98 UK pints

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).

Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
